name: Tidal Guardian
description: Massive armored warriors who serve as the ultimate defenders of Naga strongholds. Their enchanted anchor-weapons can devastate entire groups of enemies.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Slams anchor into the ground, dealing damage in an area and reducing attack damage of affected enemies by 40%.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.description: Channels the power of the tide, creating a wave that pushes enemies back and slows them.
